item.title: Zorro in the Court of England
item.description: Zorro in the Court of England is a 1969 Italian adventure film directed by Franco Montemurro.

item.title: Degueyo
item.description: Degueyo is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giuseppe Vari.

item.title: Wanted
item.description: Wanted is an Italian western film released in 1967. It was directed by Giorgio Ferroni and starring Giuliano Gemma, Teresa Gimpera, and Nello Pazzafini. Gemma made two more westerns directed by Ferroni, with similar plots, where his character likewise carried the first name "Gary".

item.title: Une corde
item.description: Cemetery Without Crosses, is a 1969 Spaghetti Western film by Robert Hossein, its director, co-screenwriter and star.

item.title: Vengeance Is My Forgiveness
item.description: Vengeance Is My Forgiveness is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Roberto Mauri.

item.title: Son of Django
item.description: Son of Django is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Osvaldo Civirani.

item.title: Those Dirty Dogs
item.description: Those Dirty Dogs is a 1973 Italian-Spanish Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Giuseppe Rosati and starring Gianni Garko and Stephen Boyd. The film was made in the later part of the spaghetti western boom. As such it features such latter-day genre elements as self-parody, guffaw humour, near-slapstick fight scenes, machine guns hidden in everyday household items, and bombastic villains.

item.title: Zorro alla corte d’Inghilterra
item.description: Zorro alla corte d’Inghilterra ist ein im deutschen Sprachraum nicht gezeigter Abenteuerfilm aus dem Jahr 1969. Die italienische Produktion unter der Regie von Franco Montemurro nutzt die fiktionale Figur des maskierten Kämpfers für Gerechtigkeit im ungewohnten Umfeld der britischen Krone.

item.title: Für Dollars ins Jenseits
item.description: Für Dollars ins Jenseits ist ein 1965 entstandener Italowestern, den Giuseppe Vari unter dem Pseudonym Joseph Warren inszenierte. Deutsche Erstaufführung war am 2. April 1967.

item.title: Wanted
item.description: Wanted ist ein Italowestern von Giorgio Ferroni aus dem Jahr 1967. In Deutschland ist der Film auch unter dem Titel Wanted – Für drei lumpige Dollar erschienen. Der Film war in deutschen Kinos erstmals am 27. April 1967 zu sehen.
